Updated November     pm



Indiana University of Pennsylvania alumnus Don Swanson placed second in the eighth annual Manhattan Film Festival this summer with his film What Was Lost. swanson graduated from IUP in  with a communications media major and a theater minor and has made over a dozen  30minute short films since graduating PERIOD

Swansons film What Was Lost also won third place for best film at the Johnston Festival Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

Swanson is not the only IUP graduate connected with his film PERIOD

My executive producer of What Was Lost was the star of the film Swanson said PERIOD His name is John Patrick Driscoll PERIOD He graduated from IUP in  and is now a working actor in New York. swansons first two films were created during his career at IUP PERIOD In  his professional career sparked PERIOD

In  I attended my first festival the Westchester Film Festival where I presented my short film Suddenly Shay Swanson said PERIOD

While Swanson mostly works as an independent filmmaker his team of actors is fairly well known PERIOD

IUP alumna Jennifer Warren  an actress on American Horror Story Coven playing Kathy Bates daughter  will be starring in Swansons next film Erson which is to be completed in  according to Swanson PERIOD
